name: Annoying Seagull Simulator
description:
Annoying Seagull Simulator

People are celebrating easter outside and crowding your park. You must defend your home by making people want to leave your park. Fly around a small diorama of a park and try to cause as much chaos in as little time as possible.

Play as a seagull on a quest to cause as much chaos (and property damage) as possible. Attack people, fling open bins, carry heavy objects, and shit all over people in this strange game about a very angry seagull. 

Upload your best time in the comments to share with others!

W - Glide

S - Fly

A - Turn left

D - Turn right

Space - Attack/Dash/Frenzy/Drop object

R - Restart

Note: This game was made in 1 week and is VERY buggy!

Music from: www.uppbeat.io
